naslov: Brač - Sutivan, VILLA SA BAZENOM (novogradnja) VIDEO / čitaj opis (prodaja)
opis: - ekskluzivna prodaja agencije #adriaINgroup - kupac plaća agencijsku proviziju 3% od prodajne cijene Cijenjeni klijenti, razgled nekretnine moguć je isključivo uz potpisani posrednički ugovor koji je temelj za daljnje radnje vezane za kupoprodaju, a sve sukladno Zakonu o posredovanju u prometu nekretnina. NAPOMENA: detaljne slike i video vile šaljemo na upit Samostojeća vila u Sutivanu novije gradnje s pogledom na planine i more, udaljena cca 350 metara od mora/plaže. - brutto 370m2 na okućnici 470m2 - završetak gradnje 2023.godina ....................................................................................... - PODRUM: kotlovnica + prostor pogodan za vinoteku / konobu itd. - PRIZEMLJE: dnevni boravak s kuhinjom i blagovanom, sanitarni čvor, soba sa kupatilom - 1.KAT: 3 spavaće sobe sa 3 kupatila - KROVNA TERASA Villa ima velike terase za opuštanje, veliki bazen sa jacuzzijem, natkrivena terasa za ugodne večere uz roštilj... + 4 sobe sa wc-om, veliki dnevni boravak sa kuhinjom, 4 spavaće sobe sa kupatilima, terasa na krovu sa pogledom + dva natkrivena parking mjesta - kompletna vila klimatizirana / podno grijanje u cijeloj villi / solari eng....................................................................................... - exclusive sale of the agency #adriaINgroup - the buyer pays an agency commission of 3% of the sales price Dear clients, viewing the property is only possible with a signed brokerage contract, which is the basis for further actions related to the sale, and all in accordance with the Act on Brokerage in Real Estate Transactions. NOTE: we send detailed pictures and videos of the villas on request Detached villa in Sutivan of recent construction with a view of the mountains and the sea, approx. 350 meters from the sea/beach. - gross 370m2 on a plot of 470m2 - completion of construction in 2023 ................................................... ..................................... - CELLAR: boiler room + space suitable for a wine shop / tavern, etc. - GROUND FLOOR: living room with kitchen and dining room, bathroom, bedroom with bathroom - 1ST FLOOR: 3 bedrooms with 3 bathrooms - ROOF TERRACE The villa has large terraces for relaxing, a large swimming pool with a jacuzzi, a covered terrace for pleasant dinners with a barbecue... + 4 rooms with toilet, large living room with kitchen, 4 bedrooms with bathrooms, terrace on the roof with a view + two covered parking spaces - complete villa air-conditioned / underfloor heating throughout the villa / solarium #adriaINgroup real estate-consulting-design-development-VIP service ...............................................................
